thread.section_title: Courtyard Paris Boulogne - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Boulogne-Billancourt, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Lovely Stay!
thread.title_full: Lovely Stay! - Review of Courtyard Paris Boulogne, Boulogne-Billancourt, France - TripAdvisor

author: Becka L
title: Lovely Stay!
text: I stayed at this hotel over New Year with my boyfriend, we really liked the hotel, it was lovely, clean and spacious and the staff could not do enough for us, they really went out their way to help us! The breakfast had a wide selection and there was someone for everyone! The location is also great and is just a short walk from the train station, we got a taxi from the airport but a train to the airport, would definitely recommend the train, it is much cheaper and quicker!
